dmca.title: Abuse Report Please Act!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 7:57 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3297808O] [Fwd: [ADMINS] Abuse Report Please
Act!]

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
The below website, hosted/registered by you, has stolen my website
content: 
http://sulaimaneffendi.com 
 
For example the content of the below page: 
http://sulaimaneffendi.com/?p=63 
 
is stolen from one of my website pages at 
http://www.weboma.com/how-to-close-the-websitesweblogs-that-steal-your-w
ebsite-content/ 
 
Please act and stop this website and let me know as soon as possible. I
will be waiting for one day and then will call my attorney. 
 
Regards, 
Vahid
